title: Bricks
description: Ever feel like you spend more time managing spreadsheets than actually using them to get things done? Bricks is a new AI spreadsheet that does the work for you. No more learning how to write formulas, googling how to do things, fighting with pivot tables, vlookup, chart creator, conditional formatting, hours of data cleanup, and all the other busy work you end up doing in spreadsheets. With Bricks you can just type what you want using natural language, and AI will just do it for you.
